      Hi

Iam trying to execute simple test case from eclipse3.1 IDE using =
ant build.xml.

I have written for that

<!-- Setup Junit framework --> 
<t=
arget name=3D"JUNIT" >
<available property=3D"junit.present" classname=3D"j=
unit.framework.TestCase" classpathref=3D"classpath"/>
</target>


<!-- Comp=
ile the application test classes -->
<target name=3D"compile-tests" depends=
=3D"JUNIT">
<mkdir dir=3D"${build.dir}" /> 
<javac srcdir=3D"${testsrc.dir}=
" destdir=3D"${build.dir}">
<classpath refid=3D"classpath"/>
<include name=
=3D"**_/*Test.java"/>
</javac>

</target>

<!-- Run the application test cl=
asses -->
<target name=3D"runtest" depends=3D"compile-tests" if=3D"junit.pr=
esent"> 
<junit> 
<formatter type=3D"plain" usefile=3D"false" /> 
<classpat=
h refid=3D"classpath"/>
<test name=3D"NumTest"/>
</junit> 
</target>
